api/JeremyAnsel.Xwa.Dat.DatImageFormat.h.title: Enum DatImageFormat
api/JeremyAnsel.Xwa.Dat.DatImageFormat.h.keywords: Enum DatImageFormat Namespace : JeremyAnsel.Xwa.Dat Assembly : JeremyAnsel.Xwa.Dat.dll Syntax public enum DatImageFormat Fields Name Description Format23 Format: 8-bit indexed colors and 8-bit alpha, rle compressed. Use: concourse. Format24 Format: 8-bit indexed colors and 8-bit alpha. Use: in-flight. Format25 Format: 32-bit ARGB. Use: in-flight. Format25C Format: 32-bit ARGB, LZMA compressed. Use: in-flight. Format7 Format: 8-bit indexed colors and 1-bit alpha, rle compressed. Use: concourse or in-flight.

index.html.title: JeremyAnsel.Xwa.Dat
index.html.keywords: JeremyAnsel.Xwa.Dat JeremyAnsel.Xwa.Dat is a .Net library to handle X-Wing Alliance's DAT files.
